description: The community’s stores of dried in the walls to serve as natural perches. The owls usually fend fruit, dried meat, root vegetables, preserves, and other non- for themselves, but when game is scarce, the residents provide perishable foods are kept in this two-level structure at the top their owls with food and water here. These owls are trained of a particularly tall tree at a bend in the river. Rope ladders to respond to basic commands, such as “come,” “hunt,” and all around the trunk provide easy access but can be taken up “scout,” from any elf.
